definitions.definition: a long plastic, metal, or ceramic container that is filled with water so that you can sit or lie in it to wash your whole body
the activity of washing yourself or someone else in a bath:
examples: mainly UK Susannah has a long hot bath every evening.

definitions.definition: to fill a bath with water for washing:
examples: I'll run you a bath while you take off those wet clothes.

definitions.definition: used to refer to a bathroom when describing a home:
a public place where people went in the past to have a hot bath
to wash in a bath or to wash someone in a bath:
